title: PALLBEARER Announces US Tour Dates For March
description: Cinder Well will open all the shows.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 3 hours ago
excerpt: Cinder Well will open all the shows.
text: Pallbearer has announced a handful of US tour dates for this March with openers Cinder Well. The tour kicks off on March 1 at Chelsea's Live in Baton Rouge, LA and wraps up a few weeks later on March 29 at JJ's Live in Fayetteville, AR. Tickets are available here. "As we pass through the end of winter we'll cross the southwest, with support from Cinder Well," wrote Pallbearer. "We hope to bring a shared intensity and catharsis amidst these darkened days. Tickets are on sale now." 3/1 Baton Rouge, LA Chelsea's Live3/2 San Antonio, TX The Rock Box3/3 Denton, TX Rubber Gloves3/5 Tucson, AZ 191 Toole3/7 Oakland, CA Eli's Mile High Club3/8 Los Angeles, CA The Midnight Hour3/24 Costa Mesa, CA The Wayfarer3/25 San Diego, CA Brick by Brick3/27 Albuquerque, NM Insideout3/28 Oklahoma City, OK Beer City Music Hall3/29 Fayetteville, AR JJ's Live Want More Metal? html:
Pallbearer has announced a handful of US tour dates for this March with openers Cinder Well. The tour kicks off on March 1 at Chelsea's Live in Baton Rouge, LA and wraps up a few weeks later on March 29 at JJ's Live in Fayetteville, AR. Tickets are available here.

"As we pass through the end of winter we'll cross the southwest, with support from Cinder Well," wrote Pallbearer. "We hope to bring a shared intensity and catharsis amidst these darkened days. Tickets are on sale now."

3/1 Baton Rouge, LA Chelsea's Live
3/2 San Antonio, TX The Rock Box
3/3 Denton, TX Rubber Gloves
3/5 Tucson, AZ 191 Toole
3/7 Oakland, CA Eli's Mile High Club
3/8 Los Angeles, CA The Midnight Hour
3/24 Costa Mesa, CA The Wayfarer
3/25 San Diego, CA Brick by Brick
3/27 Albuquerque, NM Insideout
3/28 Oklahoma City, OK Beer City Music Hall
3/29 Fayetteville, AR JJ's Live
